title: Blue Pixel | Full Stack. Freelancing. Quality

home.primary_text: Bringing quality and creativity to software
home.secondary_text: We are commited to meeting the expectations of our customers. We achieve this by mixing technology and innovation to deliver the best experience.

list.name: Web Development
list.description: When doing web development, we think mobile first. Your mobile visitors will have just as good an experience as your desktop users.

list.name: Full Stack
list.description: We wear many hats: from setting up your infrastructure and creating backend services, all the way to rounding the corners of your website's buttons.

list.name: Improving performance
list.description: Your website's loading time is affecting your bottom line. We can analyze and improve your website's loading time, or the number of operations per second that your services can handle.

list.name: Quality assurance
list.description: We help you maintain a quality standard for your software over its entire lifetime with performance and automated testing.

list.name: SEO
list.description: SEO is the holy grail of Web traffic acquisition. SEO campaings take longer to become effective, but can bring highly qualified traffic with no recurring cost.

list.name: Support
list.description: You won't have to worry about software created by us breaking down. We're available to provide support after delivery.

list.name: Alex Mihai
list.description: Software Engineer by day, Hacker by night. Simple can be harder than complex: the purpose of software engineering is to control complexity, not create it.

list.name: Alexandru Daicu
list.description: I like thinking outside the box. Not everything is meant to be improved "Telephone did not come into existence from the persistent improvement of the postcard."

list.name: Vitalie Maldur
list.description: I believe that software will help humanity to make the next step in evolution. Embrace continuous learning to get better. Dream big, start small in software and in life.
